title: Learning
body: The original teachings of the Buddha: the Dhamma and Vinaya preserved under the Theravāda tradition enshrined in the Pāli Canon.

title: Discipline
body: Training according to the disciplinary rules as per the Vinaya Pitaka.

title: Propagation
body: Disseminating the Theravāda teachings to a global audience.

title: Prolonging the dispensation (sāsana)
body: Building the capacity of trainee-clergy (monks and nuns), so that once trained, they would be able to ordain and train novices to preserve the Bhikkhu lineage in an efficient manner..
